categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens voice actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens voice actors

nodes.text: Michelle Rejwan (b. March 8, 1982) is a co-producer of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. (She is also credited with providing "additional voices" for the former, as well as LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens.) In 2019, she was appointed as Lucasfilm’s Senior Vice President of Live Action Development and Production.
Prior to the Star Wars films, Rejwan had worked with director J.J. Abrams on multiple projects.
